title: Light (Weapon Property)

Light is a Weapon Property in Baldur's Gate 3. Light grants the ability to be dual-wielded alongside another weapon with this property. Weapon Properties grant different weapon types, diverse features that are intrinsic to that specific weapon type.

Light Information
